unnormalised: ## Ditch the CDs, Yaar! How Music Streaming Changed the Game
normalised: ## Ditch the C D's, Yaar! How Music Streaming Changed the Game

unnormalised: Remember those days, friends? Lining up outside Planet M to snag the latest album, or painstakingly ripping CDs to your computer? Those were the days, alright, but honestly? Music streaming has completely changed the game, hasn't it?
normalised: Remember those days, friends? Lining up outside Planet M to snag the latest album, or painstakingly ripping C D's to your computer? Those were the days, alright, but honestly? Music streaming has completely changed the game, hasn't it?

unnormalised: It's like a Bollywood montage – remember Dil Chahta Hai when they're driving to Goa and the perfect song just magically starts playing on the car stereo? That's kind of what music streaming feels like all the time!
normalised: It's like a Bollywood montage – remember Dil Chahta Hai when they're driving to Goa and the perfect song just magically starts playing on the car stereo? That's kind of what music streaming feels like all the time!

unnormalised: Gone are the days of carrying around a clunky Walkman or worrying about scratches on your favourite cassette (RIP, Kumar Sanu's 'Aashiqui'). Now, you've got access to literally millions of songs right at your fingertips.
normalised: Gone are the days of carrying around a clunky Walkman or worrying about scratches on your favourite cassette (R I P, Kumar Sanu's 'Aashiqui'). Now, you've got access to literally millions of songs right at your fingertips.

unnormalised: Think about it - you're stuck in Bangalore traffic on Outer Ring Road, and instead of getting super frustrated, you can just pop on some A.R. Rahman and transport yourself to another world. Or maybe you're studying late at IIT Delhi and need some pump-up music to get you through that calculus problem? BOOM! Instant access to your motivation playlist.
normalised: Think about it - you're stuck in Bangalore traffic on Outer Ring Road, and instead of getting super frustrated, you can just pop on some A.R. Rahman and transport yourself to another world. Or maybe you're studying late at I I T Delhi and need some pump-up music to get you through that calculus problem? BOOM! Instant access to your motivation playlist.

unnormalised: And it's not just about convenience. Music streaming has also made it easier to discover new artists and genres. Platforms like Spotify and Apple Music have algorithms that actually learn what you like and suggest similar artists. I’ve discovered some incredible Carnatic music artists that way!
normalised: And it's not just about convenience. Music streaming has also made it easier to discover new artists and genres. Platforms like Spotify and Apple Music have algorithms that actually learn what you like and suggest similar artists. I’ve discovered some incredible Carnatic music artists that way!

unnormalised: The affordability is a big factor too. For around Rs. 99 a month (sometimes even less with family plans!), you get access to more music than you could ever possibly listen to. Compare that to buying CDs back in the day - easily Rs. 300-500 per album!
normalised: The affordability is a big factor too. For around rupee ninety nine a month (sometimes even less with family plans!), you get access to more music than you could ever possibly listen to. Compare that to buying C D's back in the day - easily rupee three hundred-five hundred per album!

unnormalised: Of course, there are still those die-hard vinyl lovers out there, and I respect that. But for most of us, music streaming has become the go-to way to enjoy our favourite tunes.
normalised: Of course, there are still those die-hard vinyl lovers out there, and I respect that. But for most of us, music streaming has become the go-to way to enjoy our favourite tunes.

unnormalised: So, crank up the volume, download those playlists, and embrace the musical revolution! What are your favorite streaming platforms and must-listen artists right now? Let me know in the comments!
normalised: So, crank up the volume, download those playlists, and embrace the musical revolution! What are your favorite streaming platforms and must-listen artists right now? Let me know in the comments!
